actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Governmental Efficiency.
Committee on Governmental Affairs requested executive comment from Government of the District of Columbia; OMB.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Governmental Efficiency and the District of Columbia

official_title: A bill to amend title 11 of the District of Columbia Code to require the Council of the District of Columbia to establish the fees for jurors serving in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Amends the District of Columbia Code to require the Council of the District of Columbia to establish the fees and allowances for jurors serving in the Superior Court.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 11 of the District of Columbia Code to require the Council of the District of Columbia to establish the fees for jurors serving in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia.
